location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident at Bushire, to Captain George Brown Walker, Senior Marine Officer in the Gulf of Persia

mods.abstract: Transmits by the cruizer Nautilusthe sum of 500 German Crowns and 5000 New Persian Rupees for the use of the squadron. Stannus also sends the balance of the cash left in deposit in the Residency treasury by Lieutenant Kinchant on his departure for Bassorah [Basra].
